job_title: Vice President of Marketing in Los Angeles, CA
pros:
The International Association of Professions Career College (IAP Career College) is an exceptional educational institution and an absolute joy to work at. The faculty and staff genuinely care about students and are committed to helping people break into their dream careers through completing one of the college’s online certificate programs. One of the most rewarding things about working at IAP is witnessing people transform their lives daily by breaking into a new career – to-date, IAP Career College has helped hundreds of thousands of career changers make their dream careers a reality.

Before I worked at IAP Career College, I completed one of the college’s online certificate programs. The content was extremely useful (including practical step-by-step techniques) and the certificate I earned gave me the confidence and credibility to start a new career. I loved that I could complete the online course when it was convenient for me  - and -  my favorite part was having access to a faculty member (industry expert) that was available by video conference to answer questions and even provide career advice.

IAP Career College is an amazing place to work and a game changer for anyone looking to start a new career through completing one of the college’s online certificate programs.
cons: No cons - IAP Career College is an absolute joy to work at!
